data.title: Validation: Codes to compare simulation data to various observations
data.name: validation
data.description: codes to compare simulation data to various observations

evidence: "code to compare several observations to simulated data with stellar mass and star formation rate, plus required data files (for observations)"
"code to compare simulated data stellar mass function with observed stellar mass function from PRIMUS or SDSS-GALEX, in several redshift bins from 0.01-1.0 makes plot with both on it"

The README only describes code and data files organized in directories (e.g., `codes/vsuite`, `codes/StellarMass/`) with no mention of package managers, binaries, or containers, implying use via cloning the source repository.
